crisp.description: The air feels crisp, sharp and clean like it was just conjured into existence.

stale.description: The air feels stale, as if it hasn't moved in centuries.

choking.description: The air feels choking, thick and heavy like it's trying to crawl into your lungs.

humid.description: The air feels humid, dense with moisture and tension.

charged.description: The air feels charged, tingling against your skin as if magic is waiting to spark.

heavy.description: The air feels heavy, pressing down on you with unseen weight.

dry.description: The air feels dry, cracking your lips and throat with every breath.

electric.description: The air feels electric, as though a storm is silently coiled within the walls.

fragrant.description: The air feels fragrant, unexpectedly pleasant and eerily inviting.

dusty.description: The air feels dusty, carrying the weight of forgotten things stirred into motion.
